attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it a Criminal Offence to Deface our National Flag(Union Flag) or the National Flags of Scotland ,Wales and N.Ireland with any Slogan ,Logo or any other wording. i.e names of football teams , countries etc.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
